File List

Here is a list of all documented files with brief descriptions:
include/sge.h [code]Main include file, the only one you should include directly. Defines a few macros and includes the other required files, see below for details
include/sgearray.h [code]A dynamic array

include/sgeevent.h [code]Low level event handling
